TopicTitle: Please don’t change the spaceplane parts!

Articles.Content:
So this is probably a first: This is a thread in Suggestions and Development Discussion that’s asking SQUAD not to do something.

I’d prefer that (and I’ve seen several people around the forums with a similar view) SQUAD left Porkjet spaceplane parts alone. They’re the best looking parts in the stock game. With their current revamp efforts, they’ve been going in a PJ-ish direction, so I hope that they’ll keep them as they are. 

However, with SQUAD’s general policy of silence, we don’t have a clue what’s in 1.7 and beyond other than the Twitch re-do they teased a couple of days ago. Who knows what they’ll do, if anything.
